summary: To help ensure veterans have timely access to health care, the Department of Veterans Affairs purchases care from non-VA providers—known as community care—in addition to providing its own care. We looked at how VA estimates resource needs for community care: VA updated its budget projection model to estimate most of the resources needed VA authorized 1.8 million veterans to use community care in fiscal year...
title: VA Health Care: Estimating Resources Needed to Provide Community Care
